title: A novel CuAl2O4/MoS2/BaFe12O19 magnetic photocatalyst simultaneously coupling type I and Z-scheme heterojunctions for the sunlight-driven removal of tetracycline hydrochloride
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00970J, Paper
Mengjun Han, Shifa Wang, Xinmiao Yu, Xianlun Yu, Huajing Gao, Xianju Zhou, Dengfeng Li, Leiming Fang, Jagadeesha V. Angadi, Mohd Ubaidullah, Bidhan Pandit
A novel CuAl2O4/MoS2/BaFe12O19 (CAO/MS/BFO) magnetic photocatalyst simultaneously coupling type I and Z-scheme heterojunctions have been synthesized by means of the wet chemistry method and heat treatment technology and exhibits high...
